page.title: 06St. John's School
page.content: {St. John's School}is a typical junior and infant school. We have 3 infant and 4 junior classes with a floating teacher for group work. We are a{Church School}and we have strong links with the Church. We do a lot of work with nature and have a pond, wild corner and animal house for rabbits and guinea pigs. We send children on a lot of trips, with residential ones for the top two years. We do all the usual subjects with a lot of drama and music, putting on concerts during the year. We have clubs for football, matball, gymnastics, chess and computers. The school has a happy atmosphere, most of the teachers are {locals}and the school has a{good } {relationship{with parents. }
